entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
